Name: Cracking the AP Physics B Exam, 2014 Edition (College Test Preparation)

ReviewList.Text: Its alright, there are some errors that you have to catch yourself, sometimes its like they made it in a week and didn't bother to review the equations. The book does not explain much its expected that you automatically understand it.
A comprehensive and targeted guide to the AP Physics exam.  Excellent sample problems and detailed, step-by-step explanations make this one of the top choices for AP preparation.

I'm taking the  A-Level Physics, SAT Physics, and AP Physics B exam, and I can say that this book has helped me prepare for ALL of them. The End-of chapter questions really test your knowledge, and I'm very thankful that this book is very deep and conceptual. DO NOT BUY BARRON'S! It does nothing but give you the formulas, and the questions are the SAME ones they used in their SAT physics book. Buy Princeton Review, do the Practice tests in the back, and you'll be much closer to a 5.

It took a little longer to get to us then we had hoped, but it was a great price and when we did get the book it was brand new and exactly what we wanted.  My daughter is using it evryday - saved us a bunch of money.  I definitely suggest this route just plan ahead with the time factor, don't procrastinate.

I highly recommend this book for anyone who take AP courses in school. They work very well and I can clearly see that they helped improve my test score! They tell you exactly how and what to study. They also have books for other AP tests that I recommend as well!

I'm a High School senior preparing to take an AP test to gain college credit for physics. I am no stranger to AP testing or to Princeton Review books. They are always extremely helpful, especially if you feel you are on the cusp of getting credit, they always help push me over the edge. The only problem with these books is that you actually have to study with them! I know, shocker. But many of my classmates will gripe about these not being as helpful as they say they are and they simply did not put in the time to actually make them worth it. These books are definitely worth the money considering they help you gain college hours for WAY cheaper than the class would actually cost! If you are looking to take the Physics B  test, even if you are pretty confident in your physics skills, I would recommend buying it. Its a $20 book that really can make the difference between credit and no credit!
Great book it met my expectations.Lots of exercises and worked out examples to refer too.Its really a great resources .

This book is a wonderful tool to use, it provides good information and teaches students without really needing a teacher, it provides a variety of examples and great practice to improve skills in different parts of physics. I recommend anyone talking or currently in AP physics B classes to purchase this book from amazon. The service that I received from amazon was just wonderful, I received the book perfectly in a box with no damages or dents what so ever. It was also a very reasonable price, most AP physics B books are very expensive and amazon provides a very reasonable price.

Bought this for my cousin who was having a difficult time in his AP physics class because they were assigned a lot of college-level problems from quite a thick textbook that just didn't have the best explanations. Having taken AP Physics my self, the class and the exam (passed!), I felt the "Cracking the AP Physics Exam" books really helped lay a foundational understanding and application to allow students to pass the exam.
This book covers all of the important topics. It is helpful for test prep and for school work. Thank you

In typical Princeton review fashion, this book covers everything on the exam and nothing extra. I self studied B using only this book and after reading it over twice I managed an embarrassing 4. However, without the book, I doubt I would have passed. Do yourself a favor and pick up this review, especially if you are self studying or struggling.

The written problems of the book were inconsistent with the diagrams shown for the problems.  An exampled showed two different values for the voltage.  Also, there were spelling errors throughout the book.  My daughter tried to look past these problems as she studied, but it made it a lot harder than it should have been.

Start your AP Physics studies with this book.  It will show you the way to answer the questions on the test.  Once you know how to approach each question on the test,  it will make it so much easier to eliminate distractors.
Bought this for my brother-he is a junior in high school and he did well on his AP exam thanks to this book. The book provided many AP exam-like questions showing the answer & reasoning behind it.
My daughter never used hers because it was no help. Over complicates everything and most of the material on the exam is much more complicated than what appears in the book.
It was in shut a bad shape, it had all the front paper cover scrached it also look like it was folded that did not even deserved a 1 rate star
It's a great AP Prep Exam. Actually time your self when taking the practice exams inside and you have a chance of passing. Cheers for Physics!
The book was very helpful to my daughter education .She become more aware of the subject and was able to get more proficient in this subject.
Covers everything i need. very expected of the company and brand. Pretty self explanatory and helped me with school alot.
Great book! How can you go wrong with Princeton Review? It was highly recommended by my son's AP physic's teacher.
helped greatly with the physics review for our son and came very promptly in the mail earlier than we expected
Every one should get one of these for there AP. I got a 5 in AP physics. It's really helpful. Thank you

This prep book had everything that I expected. Covers all the topics for the exam. Reinforces the taught material with examples of problems that you may see in a test situation. Provides thorough explanations for all practice problems. The only thing that irked me about this book was that the explanations could sometimes be too thorough to the point where it got convulated. Also provides some superfluous material that you don't need to know. Overall, it is an effective tool to use to prepare for the AP exam. I would definitely recommend this
Very confusing book to read, however, physics is a very confusing subject w/o a good teacher at hand
Perfect for my son.  Uses it in 11th grade.  Just what he asked for. Nothing more to say about it!
Great boot! Received on time. Very satisfied with the services and I recommend to a friend!
it is very good.fast and excellent
It is aver god supplement book.
Good product and fast service
Both of my sons used this book to study for their AP Physics exams.  One got a score of 5; the other is still waiting to hear.
The McGraw/Hill for AP Physics 5 steps to a 5 places the material in a format that is easier to understand and apply.
I really do recommend this book to anyone from beginners to people who want to review what they learned in school
thanks great product
Great book. I did not expect it to be this big so the extra problems can really help me. :D
nice like it thnx

This book did help me prepare but I don't LOVE it. This book needs better explanations. Some explanations are way too redundant and superfluous. What is said in a paragraph could be rephrased into a couple of sentences—one sentence, even. They should hire me, lol. As said in the title, i got a 5 on Physics B, C mech and 4 physics c e+m w/o any knowledge of calculus using PR books. PR books will always remain dear to me but I must say that REA US history impressed me more, but of course, REA is only good for history. But there aren't any other ap physics study books that are as great as PR, so buy this study guide, I guess.
Good. Thanks
excelent
love it
great
This was ordered for my Grandson for Christmas.  He is studying for college and the required tests for entry and was very pleased that I was able to get it for him.
Ok book lots of information but not entirely reliable and has a much different feel than the actual AP there are some just plain errors than this book has.
I was very pleased wtih the book I ordered for my daughter.  It just took a little longer to recieve than what I thought it would take.
This book was purchased for a fried with a daughter in school, and she was very happy to receive it in scheduled time.
Didn't even use this to take the AP test..
Really helped prepare for the AP exam. The practice tests are key. They really get you a good feel for the exam. Princeton Review does a great job.

David Anderson, Ph.D.'s CRACKING THE AP ECONOMICS MACRO & MICRO EXAMS, 2011 comes packed with detail on the AP Economics Macro & Micro Exams, with tables, charts, and coverage offering planning tips to make the most of taking the exam. Any collection catering to students will find this is a 'must' packing in 2 full-length practice tests with detailed explanations and reviews of all kinds of topics. Key terms and more make this a winner! A similar arrangement makes CRACKING THE AP PHYSICS B EXAM an equally important winner for any library catering to students of the AP Physics B exam. Details on the exam's planning and questions make this a key reference.
